title: The Night Watch
description: A masterpiece of the Dutch Golden Age depicting a city militia group led by Captain Frans Banning Cocq.

title: The Assuaging of the Waters
description: A romantic depiction of a biblical scene showing the calm after the Great Flood.

title: Martin Luther at the Diet of Worms
description: A dramatic scene portraying Martin Luther defending his reforms in front of the imperial council.

title: Noli Me Tangere
description: A Renaissance depiction of Jesus and Mary Magdalene after the resurrection.

title: Human Frailty
description: An allegorical painting showing a mother and child confronted by death, reflecting the fragility of human life.

title: Witches at Their Incantations
description: A dark and eerie painting depicting witches performing their rituals, showcasing Rosa's fascination with the supernatural.
